## extractRoutes() function

Extracts route definitions from components if routes are set using decorator ComponentRoute

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function extractRoutes(components: any[]): Route[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  components | <code>any[]</code> | Array of components to be used for extraction |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Route[]`

RouteDefinition Extracted routes
